name: Maze Full of Darkness
description:
To avoid any problems with the camera, play in full screen mode.

Maze Full of Darkness is a game where you go through a dark maze with a small amount of light. But don't worry. There are lines that can help you reach the destination. But some of them won't help you. To see these lines you have to pull the right lever. Be careful with the crystals! They'll teleport you somewhere on the map. Also, try to find all of coins that are scattered all over the map.

So. Can you speedrun it?

Controls:
        [W] [A] [S] [D] or Arrow Keys - Move
        [ESC] - Quit from Full Screen
        [Scrollwheel] - Sensitivity
        [SPACE] or [Enter] - Interact with Lever
        [N] - Turn On or Off Noob Mode [once activated will set your game to Noob Mode]

Version:
1.02
      - fixed minimap for Noob Mode
      - light range changed from 80 to 120.
